titles.title: A bill to provide duty-free treatment for dicofol until January 1, 1991, after the existing duty reduction for the chemical expires on September 30, 1985.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide, through December 31, 1990, duty-free treatment of 1,1-bis (4-chlorophenyl)-2,2-2-trichloroethanol (dicofol).
